android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW.description: Allows an application to show system-alert windows. Malicious applications can take over the entire screen of the phone.

android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.BIND_ACCESSIBILITY_SE.description: Must be required by an AccessibilityService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

binary_analysis.title: Found elf built without Position Independent Executable (PIE) flag
binary_analysis.desc: In order to prevent an attacker from reliably jumping to, for example, a particular exploited function in memory, Address space layout randomization (ASLR) randomly arranges the address space positions of key data areas of a process, including the base of the executable and the positions of the stack, heap and libraries. Built with option -pie.

playstore_details.title: WhatsLov: love stickers, emoji, gif. WAStickerApps
playstore_details.description:
💋 Surprise your loved ones 🏆+15 million people have already installed it. The best love sticker app. 
Try it now, it's a free app!

💚 WAStickerApps: integrate directly into your WhatsApp stickers. 
💬 Share it in 1 tap via your favorite chat messenger. 
🎁 Customize your library with HD packs and awesome animated Gif stickers. 


⭐ Best Features ⭐
● Thousands of free stickers, cute emoji, smiley faces and the best GIF emoticons. 
● Great stickers for WhatsApp, Snapchat, Facebook, emoji for Messenger, compatible with Telegram, WeChat, IMO, Viber, Kik. It's also great for your emails, text messages (MMS), Instagram story. The messenger apps are ordered according to your favorite ones.
● For all occasions: spice up your love story, make your family smile, tease your best friends, send a love test to your lover, boyfriend or girlfriend, celebrate a birthday, …
● Customize (sticker maker): choose your background color, rotate or flip to create your own sticker.
● Share up to 10 emoji at a time.
● Premium version: Ad-free version, save to the gallery, add unlimited packages to WhatsApp… 
● Free game: the more love you share, the more you gain. 

👩‍🍳 What are we cooking?👨‍🍳
● Keyboard (GBoard) integration
● Gif search via Giphy
● Gif with animated text in your language
● “One day, One sticker” category 

HD Packages - Free to download
💬 Smileys with daily and love quotes
💝 Events: happy holidays, valentine's day, mother's day, happy birthday, halloween…
✳️ Cut The Rope © partnership. 
🎓 Funny love gif stickers from students. 
😻 Theodor the Cat, animated Cats & Dogs. 3 gif packs from Iconka designer. 
😀 Emoji 3D Gif 
🎅 Many packages for Christmas: greetings, happy new year, best wishes.
🆕 … More to discover. We regularly add new ones. 

✅ What you need to know ✅
● Free stickers but only for personal use.
● We do our best to be compatible with all messenger apps and provide emoji for Viber, stickers for Telegram, smileys for imo and kik. Nevertheless, if you have problems please contact us. 
● It is not possible to post imoji in Facebook comments. But you can use them in your timeline. 

👯 GIF format do not work everywhere 👯‍♂️
● It is not possible to add our Gifs to WhatsApp stickers, because animated stickers are not supported at this time. 
● Only videos are supported on Instagram and Snapchat, not the GIF format. 

🚫 This is not 🚫
● This is not an android emoji keyboard, these emoticons are not for texting. Our smiley and sticker are sent as images (MMS) and not as SMS.
● This is not an emoji maker. However, we do have features to customize the stickers. 
● This is not an adult emoji app. No adult stickers. We strictly respect Google policies. 

⭐ Support us ⭐
Rate us 5 stars ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ if you are happy with the app. 

🏃 Follow us 🏃
● Facebook: @EmojiShareItAgain or Whatsmiley
● Instagram: whatsmiley
● Google Play developer page: Share It Again - Smileys & Emoji Apps. Discover here all our free emoji apps.

💌 Contact us 💌
● We are always happy to help: contact@shareitagain.co
● Feel free to ask for a new sticker or feature. 

Thank you!
Share It Again company
We make apps for love & fun 

Thanks to all artists 👏
♡ Aha-Soft: www.aha-soft.com
♡ Daily Overview: www.dailyoverview.com
♡ Design Bolts: www.designbolts.com
♡ Icon8: www.icons8.com
♡ Icon Drawer team: www.icondrawer.com
♡ Iconka: www.iconka.com
♡ Icon Master: www.iconsmaster.com
♡ Mirella Design: mirella-design.blogspot.de
♡ Seanau: www.seanau.com
♡ Succo Design: www.succodesign.it
♡ Visual Pharm: www.visualpharm.com
♡ Esdac school of Montpellier, France
♡ Morgane Danièle: mdnl.art on Instagram
